Hi all,

   I follow user manual and try to start heritrix-1.14.3 on ubuntu=
 8.04. But the terminal outputs: "starting heritrix......" . I wait a long =
time but it doesn't output 
following as user manual says. I have installed=
 jdk and have set HERITRIX_HOME.

Usage: heritrix --help
  Usage: heritrix =
--nowui ORDER.XML
  Usage: heritrix [--port=3D#] [--run] [--bind=3DIP,IP...=
] --admin=3DLOGIN:PASSWORD \
      [ORDER.XML]
  Usage: heritrix [--port=3D=
#] --selftes


Who can tell me the reason? Thanks.

Chuan
